summary: Removed all custom gradient designs from banner section. Now only shows the background image from Figma (image-23.png) with absolute positioning covering the entire container. Removed: bg-gradient-to-r background, gradient overlay div, and opacity adjustments. Kept: background image only, content (title, description, buttons) with relative z-10 positioning above image.
current_status: Banner section now displays only the background image from Figma without any custom gradient overlays or backgrounds. Clean implementation matching Figma design exactly.
